title: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green
descriptions:
**Product Title:** Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart

**Product Description:**

Transform your gardening experience with the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart. Made with a durable steel mesh frame, this cart is designed to withstand the rigors of heavy-duty gardening tasks. Its quick assembly and removable side panels make it a versatile and convenient tool for any gardening enthusiast.

The cart features 10-inch pneumatic tires, providing a smooth ride and tight turn radius, allowing you to navigate through tight spaces with ease. The ample ground clearance ensures that you can easily load and unload heavy items. The 4-wheel design provides stability and support, giving you confidence when transporting heavy loads.

The Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart has a capacity of 400 pounds and a bed size of 34 inches in length and 18 inches in width, providing ample space for carrying gardening tools, plants, and other equipment. The straight pull handle makes it easy to maneuver the cart, and the convertible design allows you to transform it into a flatbed cart for added versatility.

**Key Features:**

* Durable steel mesh frame
* Quick assembly
* Removable side panels
* Convertible design to flatbed cart
* 10-inch pneumatic tires
* Tight turn radius and ample ground clearance
* 4-wheel design for stability and support
* 400-pound capacity
* Bed size: 34 inches in length and 18 inches in width
* Straight pull handle
* 1-year limited warranty
* Overall height: 37 inches
* Weight: 36.6 pounds
* Color: Green

**Order Now and Take Your Gardening Experience to the Next Level!**
